profile.name: Mohammed Shafeeq M
profile.title: MEAN STACK DEVELOPER
profile.bio: I'm a MEAN Stack developer with 1 years of experience. I specialize in building robust and scalable web applications using MongoDB, Express.js, Angular, and Node.js. I'm passionate about crafting clean, efficient, and user-friendly solutions, and always eager to learn and explore new technologies.
profile.brief: I'm a MEAN Stack developer with 1 years of experience. I specialize in building robust and scalable web applications using MongoDB, Express.js, Angular, and Node.js. I'm passionate about crafting clean, efficient, and user-friendly solutions, and always eager to learn and explore new technologies.I'm a strong advocate for clean code, best practices, and continuous learning. I enjoy collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality projects on time and within budget. I'm eager to contribute my skills and knowledge to your team and help build innovative web applications that make a difference.

services.title: Website Design
services.description: From wireframing and UI/UX design to HTML, CSS, and JavaScript development. I create websites that seamlessly adapt to various screen sizes, ensuring optimal user experiences across all devices.

services.title: Web Development
services.description: I specialize in creating dynamic and scalable web applications. I build robust and efficient server-side applications, handling data storage and integrate APIs to enhance website functionality and data exchange.

services.title: App Development
services.description: I design intuitive and visually appealing user interfaces that enhance user engagement. My development includes high-quality mobile apps for iOS and Android using frameworks like React Native, Flutter, and Ionic.

services.title: PC App Development
services.description: I create high-performance Linux and Windows applications using C#, C++, .NET, and Visual Studio. Builds multi sectional software and integrate applications with databases like SQL Server, MySQL, and PostgreSQL.

projects.title: Online Voting System
projects.description: A simple online voting system used to elect class and school leaders of a Educational Institute:
projects.stack: HTML, CSS, EJS, JavaScript, NodeJS, ExpressJS, PostgreSQL

projects.title: Wheather APP
projects.description: A weather showing webapp created using HTML, CSS, and Javascript. API of openweather.com was used for data gathering.

projects.title: Home Automation
projects.description: This project was developed for controlling various appliances in a home remotely by ESP8266 wifi module
projects.stack: HTML, CSS, JS, NodeJS, Android, IoT

projects.title: Rentome - Rent a Home
projects.description: A single page webapp - vendors can list thier houses for rent. It provides detils of ready to rent houses and useful for a person or family looking for a rent home
